actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide hospital and medical care to certain members of the Canadian Armed Forces.

summary.text: Entitles to hospital domiciliary care and other medical services any member of the Canadian Armed Forces: (1) who served in armed conflict with an enemy of the United States during World War I or World War II; and (2) who has been a citizen of the United States for at least ten years.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide hospital and medical care to certain members of the Canadian Armed Forces.
